HPI 8453 Nissan Silvia GT (PS13) Black

This is another "fantasy" car from HPI, a flat black version of the Nissan Silvia GT raced in the 1993 JGTC series. The real thing looked something like this (and is HPI #8419):



Silvias were only raced in 1993 & 1994 and could not compete with the Skylines. The best finishing Silvia took 2nd place in 1993 and 14th place in 1994. Like the other flat black resin HPI models I have (8475 NISMO GT-R LM Road Car, 8416 2002 Ford GT40 Concept Black), the glazing is lifting from this one too. Does resin shrink over time?
